Title: Sheer Beaded Long Evening Dress

----

Sku: 82005

----

Price:

Sizes: 6, 8, 10

Colors: black-nude

Category: formal-gowns

Featured-image: 82005-black-nude-sheer-beaded-long-evening-dress_p.jpg

----

Description: Plunging V-neck is layered with a nude sheer fabric and the intricate bead work and sequins creates a scaled look. The design cascades past the waist into the skirt. The floor length skirt is ruffled tulle and flares into a trumpet silhouette. The back has a large cutout for a flirty look.
